metadata.name: Blackbird
metadata.description:
I’d been spending time with the Hopi Tribe in Arizona. Before dinner one evening, I headed out towards a rocky outcrop I’d spotted earlier in the day. A track eventually led me to a canyon adorned with hundreds, if not thousands of petroglyphs depicting Hopi’s migration and history.

As I marveled at the ancient stories, I came across some modern day graffiti and was deeply saddened, to the point at which I cried for a while.

I’d spent a very uncomfortable night sleeping on the desert floor, and I could have eaten a horse. Although tired, I was so incensed by the defaced rock art, that to calm my mind and seek forgiveness I played this piece in honor of the spirits that were watching me.

One take. Lots of mistakes. Badly mastered. Experience of a lifetime.

This NFT includes the 2011 Juan Salvador 4AE classical guitar I played in this video.

(Shipping included within the contiguous United States. Ask for quote for other destinations prior to purchase of this NFT - billed separately)
